subject: Perfect sex? It is possible!
body:
Looking for an effective and cheap solution? Tired with your sexual problems? 
Order now!
There is no need to parade your problems. There is no need to visit your local drug store. Cheapest Viagra and Cialis you can find! 
Our pharmacy
We can help you anytime! Various medications for any case!
With best regards,
Heather Sims
 
 
I chto posle etogo posledovalo Svezhie rany na shee vse eshche Sadnili pod bintom. Vot i sejchas tainstvennuiu figuru naprotiv s golovy do nog ukutyvali Prostornye skladki serogo odeianiia, polnostiu skryvshego ochertaniia tela. Veteranam bylo Ne privykat k podobnoj pogode. Drakhi ne perenosili Sten, zamknutyh pomeshchenij. 
Prezhnij radius uvelichilsia metrov na desiat, zahvativ mesto, gde ia prishel v Sebia na rassvete, i sootvetstvenno dobaviv obema. On povernulsia na bok, votknul lokot v lezhak, opustil Podborodok v ladon, kak v chashu, i voprositelno posmotrel na nee svoimi Sero-zelenymi glazami. A ee sobstvennyj zhalnik boltalsia na poiase sboku. Ladno, hot est chem gorlo promochit, chto Ochen kstati. Devstvennoe Pole snovideniia prihodit v dvizhenie, i podsoznanie, otiagoshchennoe Nerazreshennymi problemami, roniaet v celinu nebytiia pervye semena Mysleobrazov, kotorye vskore daiut svoi strashnye vshody. Navernoe, dlia nee bylo dazhe Luchshe, chto situaciia razreshilas imenno tak. Teper on nash, soobshchil Nkot. Navisshaia nado mnoj ogromnaia tusha Kengsha zamerla. 
Za preduprezhdenie blagodariu S toboj, svetlejshij, kuda Priiatnej imet delo, chem s magom dal-roktov. Menia ustraivala eta muchitelnaia smert. V moe vremia frajdeny neredkie Gosti-naemniki na planetah Federacii, kuda vhodit i moia Nova-2. Smerch priblizilsia. ejisuminyon Ql9aWFBCckBEUFRWShpARlNHUUddXVwaVlA=
